thread.title: About half-a-tonne of peaches destroyed to enforce food safety laws | Local
thread.title_full: About half-a-tonne of peaches destroyed to enforce food safety laws | Local | News | Qatar Day

author: thepeninsulaqatar
title: About half-a-tonne of peaches destroyed to enforce food safety laws | Local
text:
The Ministry of Municipality and Urban Planning today seized and destroyed about half-a-tonne of peaches which were found unfit for consumption.
The decision was part of its ongoing campaign to enforce the health and safety laws to protect consumer rights.
The fruits, imported from Lebanon, were seized from the Central Market when it was brought for auction.
